description: Google has recently released a new OS update which has made Bluetooth keyboards nonfunctional with any tablet running Android 4.3. A new patch for the operating system should be released from Google soon, which will restore Bluetooth keyboard functionality. At this time we strongly discourage updating your OS if you intend to use a Bluetooth keyboard with your Android tablet.
title: Belkin Keyboard Case and Folio for Samsung Galaxy Tab 1 - 10.1 (Fits only Galaxy Tab 1 - 10.1 Inch)
